price: Isipo kuwa anaye nyakua kitu kidogo, na mara humfwatia kimondo kinacho ng'ara.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ ٱلۡخَطۡفَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ ثَاقِبٞ
footnotes: Isipo kuwa anaye lipata neno moja hivi katika khabari za mbinguni kwa kuibia. Na huyo naye tunamwandama kwa mwenge wa moto unao murika anga kwa mwangaza wake, ukamuunguzilia mbali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā man khaṭifa al-khaṭfata fa-atbaʿahu shihābun thāqibun
